name: Introduction to Fantasy Compositing
seo_description: Sometimes the worlds we want to create are only accessible in our minds. Studio photography and costuming is only part of the visual story. This class is an introduction to creating composite portraiture with fantasy models and designers.
description: Learn to create composite portraiture with fantasy models and designers using Adobe Photoshop, mastering skin retouching, fabric wrinkle removal, costume masking, background blending, and color grading with presets.
